text: Chisimu ŵandu ŵaakwatyosyaga Achimalaika mitima jao (pa kuwa) ali ŵalitenda lupuso achimisyene (pangasama pa Maaka), akwaŵechetaga kuti: “Mukaŵechi mwaliji?” Ŵanganyao akutiji: “Twaliji wangalikombolela (ni ŵakuŵanidwa) pa chilambo.” (Achimalaika) akutiji: “Ana chilambo cha Allah nganichiŵa chakusapanguka mwanti jenumanja nikomboleka kusamila (kwine) mwalakwemo?” Basi ŵanganyao mauto gao ni Jahannama, kaje kunyalaya malo gakuwujila gakwe
